name: Reset to Default Configuration Windows Firewall with Advanced Security
description: Windows Firewall has been reset to its default configuration.
query: (winlog.channel:Microsoft\-Windows\-Windows\ Firewall\ With\ Advanced\ Security\/Firewall AND event.code:2032)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Microsoft\-Windows\-Windows\ Firewall\ With\ Advanced\ Security\/Firewall AND event.code:2032)`
